name: Window.getComputedStyle
description: The Window.getComputedStyle() method returns an object containing the values of all CSS properties of an element, after applying active stylesheets and resolving any basic computation those values may contain.

refs.name: CSS Object Model (CSSOM)
refs.description: The definition of 'getComputedStyle()' in the 'CSS Object Model (CSSOM)' specification.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Style Specification
